detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract GOLDVAULT (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GOLDVAULT.sol#77-213) has payable functions:
	 - GOLDVAULT.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GOLDVAULT.sol#105-109)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
